John H. Barry, Maricopa Coun-
ty School Superintendent, is seek
ing reelection subject to the
Democratic Primary.


The school superintendent is in
charge of the accounting and ad-
ministrative duties for the "a
school districts of Maricopa
County and processes and dis
tributes all of their warrants.
Barry has instituted an up-to-
date system of machine account
ing and posting through Data Pro-
cessing. All expenditures and
payrolls are audited and all ques-
tionable procedures are sent
through the county attorney or
attorney general. Their opinions
are distributed to the districts.


Apr Ultimately $4,000 teach
ers' certificates are recorded in
the County Office along with their
X-ray reports and the X-ray
reports of some 5000 non-cer-
tificated personnel of the schools.
During the past year in excess
of 100000 school warrants have
been issued. The amount of the
taxpayers dollars spent through
the County School Office was
over Slo0,o0o,oo0.0O. Beginning
July LIST all school perso nnel
will be paid on alternate Fridays
rather than twice each month.
The schools will also grant their
employees the privilege of par
ticipating in the Tax Sheltered
Annuity Program.

PHILADELPHIA Harry Col
den, noted editor, writer and
speaker, will receive the Elijah
P. Lovejoy Award of 1864. an
nounced Hobson R. Reynolds,
grand exalted ruler of the I'm
proved Benevolent Protective
Order of Elks of the World.


The Lovejoy Award, honoring
the Illinois white man who gave
his life protesting slavery. is
the highest honor given by the
Elks to the person who con-
tributes outstanding services to
humanity.


Golden, publisher-editor Of the
Carolina Israelite in Charlotte,
N. c., will receive the award
at the Elks national convention at
Miami, Florida on August "a.

full articles.headline:
Golden Gets EIks
Loveioy Award
full articles.article:
PHILADELPHIA Harry Col
den, noted editor, writer and
speaker, will receive the Elijah
P. Lovejoy Award of 1864. an
nounced Hobson R. Reynolds,
grand exalted ruler of the I'm
proved Benevolent Protective
Order of Elks of the World.


The Lovejoy Award, honoring
the Illinois white man who gave
his life protesting slavery. is
the highest honor given by the
Elks to the person who con-
tributes outstanding services to
humanity.


Golden, publisher-editor Of the
Carolina Israelite in Charlotte,
N. c., will receive the award
at the Elks national convention at
Miami, Florida on August "a.

full articles.headline:
BARRY SEEKS


SCHOOL POST
